Package org.apache.beam.runners.direct.portable

Defines the PipelineOptions.DirectRunner which executes both Bounded and Unbounded Pipelines on the local machine.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TransformExecutor
    A Runnable that will execute a PTransform on some bundle of input.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ReferenceRunner
    The "ReferenceRunner" engine implementation.

Package org.apache.beam.runners.direct.portable Description

Defines the PipelineOptions.DirectRunner which executes both Bounded and Unbounded Pipelines on the local machine.

See org.apache.beam.sdk.runners for more information about Pipeline Runners.
